thread.title: BRIEF-Kratos To Sell Division To Securitas For About $70 Million

title: BRIEF-Kratos To Sell Division To Securitas For About $70 Million
text: February 28, 2018 / 9:31 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Kratos To Sell Division To Securitas For About $70 Million Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 28 (Reuters) - Kratos Defense And Security Solutions Inc : * KRATOS EXECUTES DEFINITIVE AGREEMENT TO SELL PUBLIC SAFETY & SECURITY DIVISION TO SECURITAS ELECTRONIC SECURITY, INC. FOR EXPECTED NET PROCEEDS OF APPROXIMATELY $70 MILLION * KRATOS DEFENSE AND SECURITY SOLUTIONS INC - DEAL FOR ‍$69 MILLION IN CASH​ * KRATOS DEFENSE AND SECURITY SOLUTIONS INC - EXPECTS TO ULTIMATELY RECEIVE APPROXIMATELY $70 MILLION OF NET CASH PROCEEDS FROM TRANSACTION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
